local_intent: Perceive bread and plate, align and orient, then push bread laterally toward the plate and stabilize before retreating.
assumptions: ApproachAndAlign achieves suitable proximity/contact for pushing
Yaw 90 degrees is appropriate to push toward the plate in this frame
coherence_with_global: Uses the same push parameters (bread, 0.1m, 90 deg, 1200 ms); includes perception of bread and plate, alignment, yaw set to 90, push, brief wait, and retreat consistent with the global plan.
